# Biography

Kareena Shah is a senior undergraduate student at Case Western Reserve University. She is currently studying Biology and is also pursuing her Masters in Public Health. Kareena is on the pre-dental track with hopes to attend dental school in the near future. Kareena has expereince working as a dental assistant at a General Dentistry practice. She is also involved in a pharmacology research lab at the Case Western Reserve University School of Medicine. She is studying the blood platelets, specifically the PAR-4 receptor and its affect on the clotting cascade.
